definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: A happy family is much more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 幸福家庭比金錢更重要。

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提貨單是國際貿易和船運中一種很重要的單據。

sentences.english: This weight of evidence is something mystical and unanalyzable .
sentences.chinese: 證據的重要性是神祕不可解的。

sentences.english: Conclusion Complex treatment is the most effective method for treatment of residual brun wound.
sentences.chinese: 結論綜合治療是治療燒傷殘餘創面的重要方法。

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .
sentences.chinese: 復辟時期是英國財政與稅收史上的一個重要轉型時代。

sentences.english: Network tolling is the important part of network administration.
sentences.chinese: 網絡收費是網絡管理的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The antagonism of moralities is an important factor to influence world harmony.
sentences.chinese: 道德的對立是影響世界和諧的重要因素。

sentences.english: The CrossCorrelation is an essential means of getting disturbing industrial frequency.
sentences.chinese: 互相關函數是確定工頻干擾噪聲頻率的一個重要手段。

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲是在這種情況下，國際援助和監督才很重要。

sentences.english: We have held these meetings at an important time.
sentences.chinese: 我們在一個重要時刻召開這次會議。

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知識產權已經成爲外交外貿領域的重要議題。

sentences.english: The deformation and breakup of liquid droplet is important in fuel explosive dispersal.
sentences.chinese: 液滴變形和破碎是燃料拋撒問題的重要過程。

sentences.english: Conclusions Uterine cavity and fallopian tube abnormalities were the important reason of female infertile.
sentences.chinese: 結論子宮腔及輸卵管形態異常是不孕症的重要原因。

sentences.english: Heme , the prosthetic group of the hemoglobin, has been used widely and importantly.
sentences.chinese: 血紅素是血紅蛋白的輔基，有極其廣泛和重要的應用。

sentences.english: The way one studies for tests is very important.
Most importantly, this album has a stamp of Metallica written all over it.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，這張專輯的郵票金屬書面所有權。

definition: variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
